perturbation.original_text: Affiliate and each Station shall take the same security measures to prevent the unauthorized or otherwise unlawful copying or taping of the Service (or any portion thereof) by others as it takes to protect the Primary Feed transmitted by such Station.  Network acknowledges that Affiliate and the Stations do not, as of the Effective Date, take any such security measures.
perturbation.changed_text: Affiliate and each Broadcast Center shall take the same security measures to prevent the unauthorized or otherwise unlawful copying or taping of the Service (or any portion thereof) by others as it takes to protect the Primary Feed transmitted by such Station.  Network acknowledges that Affiliate and the Stations do not, as of the Effective Date, take any such security measures.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Station' is a defined term, whereas 'Broadcast Center' is an undefined term, and changes the level of requirements of the contract. It creates a discrepancy, because the 'Station' was already established as a defined term, with specific obligations listed in the contract, but it is unclear if a Broadcast Center is the same entity and is, therefore, held to the same responsibilities.

perturbation.original_text: Each Station transmitting the Service shall have the right to broadcast the Service on its Primary Feed, in addition to its broadcasts under Section 3(a).  Such broadcasts shall be subject to all terms and conditions of this Agreement, including Sections 4(e) and 8(c).
perturbation.changed_text: Each Broadcast Outlet transmitting the Service shall have the right to broadcast the Service on its Primary Feed, in addition to its broadcasts under Section 3(a). Such broadcasts shall be subject to all terms and conditions of this Agreement, including Sections 4(e) and 8(c).
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Station' is a defined term, whereas 'Broadcast Outlet' is an undefined term.  This creates confusion as it is uncertain if "Broadcast Outlet" refers to the same entity as "Station," which is used elsewhere in the contract.  Since it's undefined, there is an internal confusion about whether it is indeed the same, and also whether the existing obligations for 'Stations' apply to the newly termed 'Broadcast Outlet.'
